data.text: @XolaniVatsha @MzwaneleManyi Do you have any reading recommendations on this subject? The one I’ve read is@the Adam and Eve theory by Chan Thomas.

@MzwaneleManyi I never believed there could still be a reliable and trustworthy Bitcoin Investments Company. Until i received my withdrawal from @MorrisThompsonq At first I doubted when I was introduced   but now today am standing out here to tell you that they are 👇

@roni94995562 @MzwaneleManyi I could answer it, but the question is so thoroughly drenched in ignorance there's no point. I know how you'll argue with me. You'll deny science and call me a sheeple despite science saving your life at least a few times before you die.
@ChristianHLau @MzwaneleManyi I see you could not answer my questions 😂 you watch too much TV . Covid is flu

@roni94995562 @MzwaneleManyi What are you talking about? The pandemic doesn't "react to events". It's a virus. It doesn't have an opinion. It just does what it does... and we do what we can to prevent ourselves from dying, based on our best available knowledge. Clearly you're not exposed to that knowledge.
@MzwaneleManyi Not towing the RET party line of Putin's a hero? Good for you.

@ChristianHLau @MzwaneleManyi So the pandemic reacts to events thats what you saying cause you watch too much TV. They fool you a lot. Now if the vaccines work why you need boosters and why you still wearing a mask ????

@roni94995562 @MzwaneleManyi I don't think fabricating an alternate reality, like you're trying to do, will get us anywhere. We have to live with facts and in the real world. The invasion of Ukraine is a massive event right now and Covid is starting to be manageable with vaccines and immunity spreading.
@ChristianHLau @MzwaneleManyi So the pandemic relies on events 😂
